data.message: I love how some people assume Em is supporting Hilary or Trump. Have you asked him personally? Did he tell you who he supports? If you don't know, don't assume and who cares who Marshall supports, really. You're seriously going to stop supporting him and not be a fan because of something stupid lol... Okay.

replies.message: Nick Lavacca You can have an opinion, but in this situation I believe Em isn't to be serious. It's a freestyle he can say whatever he wants. He was a battle rapper before Dre signed him 💁
There is more to the song then the trump comments. It's an artistic view on all modern media. You think it's a trump song, then make one for Hilary, (not intended towards Patricia, but the haters)

Eminem Ready to Dropp His Surprise New Album ‘Success’ ? - Eminemshady
Eminem is dropping a new album called ‘Success’ in January featuring a surprise collaboration with Adele, according to reports. From Eminemshady
